Posts.Content: Oct 7, 2007 02:39AM KT41 wrote: Hi, i just wanted to say that i have recently been to the doctor after i experienced sharp stabbing needle like pains in both breasts.  A lump later developed and i had a biopsy.  There is a possibility it may be cancer and i am having a lumpectomy shortly.  I also had a slight rash on my chest at the time (although i am not sure if the rash was related to the pain).  I would advise you to seek a second opinion if the pains continue.  Several doctors have told me that the pains are hormonal, but i have never experienced hormonal pains with these sharp stabbing sensations.
Posts.Title: Sharp needle like pain in left breast and rash MGT44 carolv
